title: Mail Ballots Around Las Vegas Are Likely to Put Democrats Ahead
description: Senator Catherine Cortez Masto is within 1,000 votes of overtaking her Republican opponent, Adam Laxalt, and the ballots remaining in Clark County are expected to favor her.
dc:creator: Nate Cohn
media:description: A security guard patrolled outside the Clark County Election Department as workers counted ballots in Las Vegas this week.
